Min $100 at table.      $5 electronic table with 3X odds
Only had half a table open. $1 ante on come out roll
$1 ante on come out roll, open after 6pm on weekdays

their side bet was some sort of ATS variant where it counted each combination as its own roll and so if you hit all combinations of a roll it would count as one number, and if you hit two numbers (all combinations) before a 7 yo'd win money, and the highest pay is somewhere around 1000-1 I think. so you'd need an easy 4 and a hard 4 for 4 to count, and then you'd need, say, an easy 10 and a hard 10 for 10 to count, and then you'd need a 2-6, a 3-5, and a hard 8 to get 8, and then you'd win for that
